title: Long Load
body: Every time I queue in for a game and when I get in, it messes up and my connection is good. When I am going to ban it takes 10 seconds to load and I end up getting penalties because I didn't lock in the choices. The original type is better than this one. I can't believe it takes up so much time to load then I get a penalty for it.

replies.body: You seem to be losing sync during champion select and getting left behind, which can be caused by a weak connection.  You should go through the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot this.  Let me know if you have any questions!
It's advised for you to utilise the Legacy Client until the Beta Client is fully optimized, if you're experiencing issues with the Beta Client.
